ভিত্তিতে ১জন প্রধান শিক্ষক (ফুল-টাইম) নিয়োগ দেয়া হবে। দায়িত্বসমূহ: প্রতিষ্ঠানের একাডেমিক ও প্রশাসনিক কার্যক্রমের সার্বিক তদারকি। শিক্ষক নিয়োগ, প্রশিক্ষণ ও পারফরম্যান্স মূল্যায়ন। শিক্ষার মান উন্নয়ন ও ফলাফল বৃদ্ধির পরিকল্পনা বাস্তবায়ন। শিক্ষার্থী ভর্তি কার্যক্রম ও প্রতিষ্ঠান ব্র্যান্ডিংয়ে সক্রিয় ভূমিকা। শৃঙ্খলা, নৈতিকতা ও ইসলামিক পরিবেশ নিশ্চিত করা। Skills & Expertise Suggested by Lesson Planning (as per requirements from the client). Liaison with Architect & check the drawing and forwarded for construction. Sound knowledge Interior design in residential, commercial Industrial factory building and keeping a record of project properly. Giving assistance & co-ordination with the Project Engineer & concerned person. Should involve in design development, working drawings and presentation drawings. Close contact with execution or concern site in charge to ensue proper execution. Preparing all type of reports concerning design section. Provide necessary support to ensure sample collection and delivery. Top supervision of all concerns projects. Monitor weekly action plan/checklist & Update weekly project progress report. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Additional Requirements There is no age limit to apply for the posts of Social Development Intern. Responsibilities & Context Grambangla Unnayan Committee is going to appoint four (4) Social Development Interns for its social development projects. Grambangla Unnayan Committee is one of the prominent NGOs in Bangladesh working for the children in worst forms of child labour, street children, nomadic Bede community, urban informal sector workers including waste picker community, slum dwellers and low-income communities, tobacco control, public health, early childhood development, primary and technical education, primary health care, most at risk people of HIV and AIDS, etc. since 1993. Land Acquisition and AutoCAD Expert Application Deadline : 28 Feb 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 2 Age: 23 to 45 years Location: Dhaka (GULSHAN 1) Salary: Negotiable Published: 18 Feb 2026 Applicants are encouraged to submit Video CV. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 23 to 45 years Relevant Experience will be given priority considaration Responsibilities & Context Review and interpret approved engineering alignment drawings, cross-sections, and Right-of-Way (ROW) requirements. Georeference and adjust mouza maps using AutoCAD and GIS software. Digitize affected plots, structures, and other assets for Land Acquisition Plan (LAP) preparation. Identify full and partial plot acquisition; distinguish private, government, and khas land. Develop and maintain a geo-referenced GIS database of all impacted plots and structures. Prepare Plot Schedule (Daag-Shuchi), Cha-Form, and other statutory land acquisition documents for submission. Produce alignment strip maps, impact maps, cross-section and long-section (plan/profile) drawings from topographic survey data. Draft cartographic drawings and mapping annexures for inclusion in LAP. Support field verification and Joint Verification (JV) exercises with DC office and project teams. Supervise and assist field teams during surveys and verification activities. Reconcile discrepancies between field survey data, cadastral maps, and engineering designs. Perform data collection, processing, and spatial analysis using AutoCAD, Civil 3D, ArcGIS/QGIS, and other relevant software. Update maps and calculations in response to alignment or design revisions. Ensure quality control and accuracy of all spatial data, maps, and land calculations. Maintain organized digital archives of all survey outputs, maps, and GIS databases. Liaise and coordinate with clients, government officials, and stakeholders as required. Provide technical clarification and support during objection hearings and DC office reviews. To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Responsibilities & Context Responsible for: NursePosition is responsible for providing overall technical, organizational support and playing a support and facilitation role for community-based management of acute malnutrition in the Rohingya camp. Establishes and maintains close working relationships with communities in her working area in order to ensure that the nutrition messages are disseminated and understood at all levels. Responsibilities: Supports and facilitates emergency nutrition program participants in the identification and prioritization of project beneficiaries as per the national/UNICEF WHO CMAM protocol/guideline Supports and facilitates the development of an action plan Assesses health, nutrition, hygiene and sanitation-related problems Facilities, organizes, and builds skill and knowledge of caregivers on appropriate feeding practices (RUTF& RUSF), basic hygiene and sanitation Closely work with the Stabilization Center (SC), Community mobilizer team, Majhi and Imam Ensure good triage of patients/beneficiaries in the facility. Ensure that every beneficiary receives an adequate medical examination, appropriate diagnosis, treatment and referral for additional treatment following the national/UNICEF WHO CMAM protocol/guideline and standard guidelines. Conduct medical examination to targeted beneficiaries, which includes vital signs, physical examination and medical history. Prescribe routine medications and provide treatment according to standard CMAM guidelines and treatment protocols. Follow CMAM protocols in assessing, admitting and treating beneficiaries in the CMAM (OTP/TSFP) program. Timely referral of children with severe acute malnutrition (SAM) with medical complications to the Nearby stabilization Centre (SC). To ensure that any beneficiary requiring further medical assistance is referred to the nearest health facility in accordance with protocols. Correctly record all relevant information (symptoms, diagnosis, measurements, treatment plan) for each beneficiary on the appropriate forms of beneficiaries and medication given and complete the child's card (CMC) at every visit. Keep an up-to-date record of all therapeutic feeding products requisitions, consumptions, medication used and be responsible for stock management and reporting (distribution monitoring, use of non-expired drugs, stock ordering, balance stock, etc.). Ensure wastes (medical and non-medical) are adequately disposed of at the facility. Provide health education and counselling to all caretakers

Serves as a member of the Management Team and as a liaison to the Personnel Committee. & Context চাকরির দায়িত্বসমূহ: রেজিষ্ট্রেশনকৃত রোগীদের প্রাথমিকভাবে মূল্যায়ন করে ভিশন পরীক্ষা করা ও লিপিবদ্ধ করা। রোগীর ইতিহাস এবং রোগীদের সাধারণ পর্যবেক্ষণ গ্রহণ করা। রেটিনোস্কোপ ও অটো রিফ্রেক্টোমিটার দ্বারা চোখের পরীক্ষা নির্ভুলভাবে নির্নয় করা। চক্ষু বিশেষজ্ঞগণের পরামর্শ অনুযায়ী রোগীদের চোখ পরীক্ষা করে দৃষ্টিত্রুটি নির্নয় করা এবং তদানুযায়ী সংশোধনী ব্যবস্থাপত্র প্রদান করা। চশমার পাওয়ার নিরুপন করে সঠিকভাবে চশমার প্রেসক্রিপশন প্রদান করা। দৃষ্টি ত্রুটি সম্পন্ন রোগীদের ব্যবস্থাপত্র সুন্দরভাবে বুঝিয়ে দেয়া। প্রদত্ত নির্দেশনাবলী অনুসারে রোগীর চক্ষু সেবা প্রদান করা। ডাক্তারের পরামর্শ অনুযায়ী রোগীদের বায়োমেট্রিক-এ স্ক্যানসহ বিভিন্ন পরীক্ষা নিশ্চিত করা। ছানি রোগীর জন্য IOL পাওয়ার নির্ণয় করা। চক্ষু রোগীদের রোগ নির্ণয় পদ্ধতি সম্পাদনের মাধ্যমে তাদের চিকিৎসা ব্যবস্থাপনায় সহায়তা করা। রোগীদের চশমার প্রয়োজনীয়তা সম্পর্কে অবহিত করা এবং চশমা ক্রয়ে উৎসাহিত করা। দৈনিক রিফ্রাকশন রেজিষ্টার আপডেট রাখা। চক্ষু শিবিরে অংশগ্রহণ করে দৃষ্টিত্রুটি জনিত রোগীদের চশমার ব্যবস্থাপত্র প্রদান করা। ব্যবহৃত সকল যন্ত্রপাতি সঠিকভাবে পরিস্কার পরিচ্ছন্ন ও রক্ষনাবেক্ষণ নিশ্চিত করা। গাক চক্ষু হাসপাতালের উদ্দেশ্য, আদর্শ, সেবার ধরণ এবং প্রক্রিয়া সম্পর্কে জনগনকে অবহিতসহ হাসপাতালে সেবা গ্রহন করার জন্য পরামর্শ প্রদান করা। কর্তৃপক্ষের নির্দেশনা মোতাবেক অর্পিত যে কোন দায়িত্ব যথাযথভাবে পালন করা। Compensation & Other Benefits Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 3 Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time job_description: Senior Manager/AGM- HR (Factory) : A Reputed RMG Group of Compny Jobs ENG বাংলা Create Account Sign In For Employer Create Sign In Home Jobs Mybdjobs Job List A Reputed RMG Group of Compny Senior Manager/AGM- HR (Factory) Application Deadline : 19 Mar 2026 Apply Now Shortlist Share: Facebook LinkedIn WhatsApp All Requirements Responsibilities Skills & Expertise Salary & Benefits Company Information Summary Vacancy: 1 Age: 35 to 50 years Location: Gazipur Salary: Negotiable Published: 18 Feb 2026 To access Application Insights Get Bdjobs Pro Requirements Education Experience Additional Requirements Age 35 to 50 years Strong practical knowledge of Bangladesh Labor Law and factory HR operations. Proven experience in disciplinary procedures and worker management. Experience in factory or manufacturing HR will be preferred. Good communication, documentation, and problem-solving skills. Responsibilities & Context Job Overview The Senior Manager/AGM – HR (Factory) will be responsible for ensuring effective human resource management in factory operations, with a strong focus on compliance with Bangladesh Labor Law , disciplinary procedures, and worker recruitment. The role supports management in maintaining harmonious labor relations, accurate HR documentation, and regulatory compliance. Key Responsibilities Ensure full compliance with Bangladesh Labor Law and company HR policies. Handle disciplinary actions, show-cause notices, charge sheets, domestic inquiries, and related documentation. Manage worker recruitment, onboarding, and manpower planning for factory operations. Maintain employee records, attendance, leave, and personnel files in line with statutory requirements. Support management in labor relations, grievance handling, and conflict resolution. Prepare and submit required reports to management and relevant authorities. Assist in audits, inspections, and compliance-related activities. Skills & Expertise Factory HR Operation grivence Labor Law Worker Recruitment Suggested by Conflict Resolution Disciplinary Action Labor Relations Grievance Handling Worker Management Documentation Compliance Audit Compensation & Other Benefits Provident fund,Medical allowance,Mobile bill,Insurance,Gratuity Lunch Facilities: Partially Subsidize Salary Review: Yearly Festival Bonus: 2 LFA Hospitalization Benefit Paternity Leave Workplace Work at office Employment Status Full Time Gender Only males are allowed to apply.
